TechFest 2024 - CodeFeasta

Innovate, Collaborate, Win!

Event Details

Date of Event

12th November 2024

Coordinators

Student: Vivek Kumar Ray

Teacher: Prof. John Doe

About the Event

The CodeFeasta at TechFest 2024 is designed to foster innovation and collaboration among aspiring developers. Participants will work in teams to develop creative solutions to real-world problems within a limited time. Itâ€™s a great opportunity for students to test their coding skills, learn new technologies, and network with industry experts.

This event will push the limits of creativity, teamwork, and problem-solving skills. Expect a fun, challenging, and rewarding experience where you can demonstrate your talents and compete for exciting prizes!

Rules and Regulations

  • Participants must be current university students.
  • Teams should consist of 3-5 members.
  • The use of any programming language or technology is allowed.
  • Participants must submit their projects within the allocated time.
  • All decisions made by the judges are final.
